content: I'm looking into the bounds of integrals and I keep seeing Ioi, Ioc, Icc,Iio,Iic. I gather these are intervals of some sort. Where are they defined (how do I import them)? What is the naming convention and what are the parameters that follow in their use, e.g. the a in Ioi a?
Where are you seeing them? If it's within vscode, you can hover over them and it will tell you where they are defined
If its in the docs, you can click on them to the same effect
Was looking at the source on GitHub, looking at it in VSCode now I see it is in Mathlib.Data.Set.Intervals
Nicholas Wilson has marked this topic as resolved.
